trans-unit.source: Provides implicit <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> management for child messaging activities.
trans-unit.target: Ger en implicit <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"> </xref> hantering för underordnade aktiviteter-meddelanden.

trans-unit.source: The CorrelationScope activity maintains an implicit <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle> that is only visible to child activities.
trans-unit.target: Aktiviteten CorrelationScope upprätthåller en implicit <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle>som visas endast för underordnade aktiviteter.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith%2A> property is set by the user, it will be used as the CorrelationScope implicit handle.
trans-unit.target: När den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith%2A>-egenskapen anges av användaren kommer det att användas som CorrelationScope implicit handtag.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the case of nested CorrelationScope, children of the inner scope cannot access implicit handle of the outer scope.
trans-unit.target: Underordnade objekt för den inre omfattningen för kapslade CorrelationScope kommer inte åt implicit referensen för yttre definitionsområde.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity’s execution logic.
Builds and validates a description of the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
trans-unit.target: Bygger upp och validerar en beskrivning av aktivitetens argument, variabler, underordnade aktiviteter och aktivitet delegater.

trans-unit.source: The activity’s metadata that encapsulates the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
trans-unit.target: Aktivitetens metadata som kapslar in aktivitetens argument, variabler, underordnade aktiviteter och aktivitet delegater.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> used by the child messaging activities.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"> </xref> används av den underordnade aktiviteter-meddelanden.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen är skrivskyddad vid körning.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Om värdet anges vid körning, en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>genereras.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The runtime uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> for correlation if it is present, otherwise the **CorrelatesWith** property of the messaging activity will be used.
trans-unit.target: Körtidsbiblioteket använder den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A>för korrelation om den finns, annars den **CorrelatesWith** -egenskapen för aktiviteten meddelanden kommer att användas.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both are absent, the ambient handle provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> or the workflow service is used.
trans-unit.target: Om båda saknas omgivande referensen som tillhandahålls av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>eller arbetsflödestjänsten används.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>

trans-unit.source: The correlation handle used by the child messaging activities.
trans-unit.target: Korrelationsreferens som används av den underordnade aktiviteter-meddelanden.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to execute the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope"></xref> activity.
trans-unit.target: Anropas av arbetsflödet körningsmiljön att köra den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope"> </xref> aktivitet.

trans-unit.source: The current native activity execution context.
Indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith*> property should be serialized.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith*>egenskapsvärdet måste vara serialiserade, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith*>
